name: Kinedu, Inc.
description: Developer of an educational platform designed to develop nourishing and meaningful relationships with children through creative activities. The company's platform offers engaging personalized video-based developmental activities for children, enabling parents to boost the cognitive, social, linguistic, emotional, and physical progress of their toddlers in the stage of their early development.
one_liner: Developer of an educational platform designed to develop nourishing and meaningful relationships with children through creative activities. The company's platform offers engaging personalized video-based developmental activities for children, enabling parents to boost the cognitive, social, linguistic, emotional, and physical progress of their toddlers in the stage of their early development.
